  • Method Details

    • getWorkingHours

      WorkingHours getWorkingHours()
      Returns:
      the current working hours (open/close schedule) as a WorkingHours object

    • setOpeningHours

      void setOpeningHours(String openingTime)
      Parameters:
      openingTime - expects a String with the format of "HH:mm" to represent the new opening time for the store

    • setClosingHours

      void setClosingHours(String closingTime)
      Parameters:
      closingTime - expects a String with the format of "HH:mm" to represent the new closing time for the store

    • getCheckoutsToday

      String getCheckoutsToday()
      Returns:
      the number of checkouts having the date set to the current day

    • getItemsToday

      String getItemsToday()
      Returns:
      the number of items * quantity from the checkouts having the date set to the current day

    • getSalesToday

      String getSalesToday()
      Returns:
      the income given all the items * quantity from the checkouts having the date set to the current day

    • getCheckoutsThisMonth

      String getCheckoutsThisMonth()
      Returns:
      the number of checkouts having the date within 30 days in the past from the current day

    • getItemsThisMonth

      String getItemsThisMonth()
      Returns:
      the number of items * quantity from the checkouts having the date within 30 days in the past from the current day

    • getSalesThisMonth

      String getSalesThisMonth()
      Returns:
      the income given all the items * quantity checkouts having the date within 30 days in the past from the current day
